data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pachuca needs to be cautious. Pumas UNAM have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Juan Dinenno for Pumas UNAM drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Pachuca drives forward and Victor Davila gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 5, Nicolas Freire of Pumas UNAM gets in a strike, but is off target.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pachuca are pushing forward but Victor Davila's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 11, Pachuca to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 13, Pachuca to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 15, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Pachuca.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Pumas UNAM's Facundo Waller gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 17, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 19, Luis Chavez of Pachuca gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In Mexico City, Antonio Figueroa of Pachuca is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 23, Victor Guzman (Pachuca) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In Mexico City, Pachuca push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 25, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Alan Mozo (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 28, Free kick Pachuca.
Pachuca's Oscar Murillo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 29, Pachuca apply pressure at Estadio Olimpico Universitario and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Victor Davila but the strike hits the bar!
At Estadio Olimpico Universitario, Pachuca are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 31, In Mexico City Pachuca attack through Luis Chavez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Julio Gonzalez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 35, Julio Gonzalez has recovered and rejoins the match in Mexico City.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pachuca are coming forward and Victor Davila gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 43, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Pachuca.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 45, Fernando Hernandez Gomez will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 45, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pachuca throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
The first-half has come to a close in Mexico City.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Juan Dinenno (Pumas UNAM) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM's Alan Mozo breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, In Mexico City Pumas UNAM drive forward through Carlos Gonzalez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 51, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Erick Sanchez is replacing Victor Davila for Pachuca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Victor Sosa is on a sub for Antonio Figueroa for Pachuca.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 58, Facundo Waller for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Andres Iniestra is replacing Facundo Waller for the home team.
In the minute 61, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Pachuca push upfield but Fernando Hernandez Gomez quickly pulls them for offside.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Pachuca's half.
In the minute 64, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 68, Paulo Pezzolano is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Universitario with Felipe Pardo replacing Victor Guzman.
Pachuca make their fourth substitution with Roberto Nurse replacing Emmanuel Garcia.
In the minute 69, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 71, Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Carlos Gutierrez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 73, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Pumas UNAM, close to Pachuca's area.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Carlos Gutierrez with Juan Iturbe.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 77, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Bryan Gonzalez is replacing Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes for the away team.
Pumas UNAM are pushing forward but Juan Iturbe's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 79, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Vigon misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Free kick Pachuca.
Pachuca advance rapidly upfield but Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows for offside.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 84, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 86, Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Mexico City.
Pachuca have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 89, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
Pumas UNAM’s Julio Gonzalez is on his feet again at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Julio Gonzalez for Pumas UNAM who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Bryan Mendoza is on a sub for Juan Dinenno for Pumas UNAM.
